strings.Value: "I feel I've spent a dozen years in a cold dungeon, without a single ray of sunlight."
"It's been a long time since I felt so fatigued. Like I've spent four seasons in a windowless cell."
"Sarenrae's clerics are like flowers — they wilt without the sun! The good thing is, unlike flowers, they don't attract bees."
"Please have a good rest, Tristian. I'll take your place keeping watch, if you like."
"I wish I could switch places with you. One's suffering is another's blessing."
"You're making my jaw hurt. I wonder — is it laughter or disgust?"
"I like it better without sun. Goblins like it best in dark. More sneaking, better ambushes!"
